source:
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_00One cannot excavate on an empty stomach, as Qhoterl Pasol well knows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_00 Schwierigkeitsanpassung (Job/Klasse darf nicht gewechselt werden)

Qhoterl Pasol möchte die Nahrungsversorgung sicherstellen.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_01<tab>Qhoterl Pasol die gewünschte Ware bringen

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid ant eggs at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid ant eggs to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid silkworms at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid silkworms to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid robber crab at the Lozatl)) ((Deliver the splendid robber crab to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((In Mjrls Sehnsucht <var 32 ((Item)) 06E806030502 /var> finden)) ((Qhoterl Pasol <var 32 ((Item)) 03E806030502 /var> bringen)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((In Mjrls Sehnsucht <var 32 ((Item)) 06E806030502 /var> ernten)) ((Qhoterl Pasol <var 32 ((Item)) 03E806030502 /var> bringen)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Im Lozatl <var 32 ((Item)) 02E806020502 /var> fangen)) ((Qhoterl Pasol <var 32 ((Item)) 02E806020502 /var> bringen)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Digging is whisker-warping work, as I'm sure you will agree. If one is to keep at it day in and day out, one must have good, nourishing meals.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Puh, Ausgrabungen gehen ganz schön auf Knochen! Und wer hart arbeitet, muss gut futtern.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>If you're willing, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might I trouble you to bring some ingredients so that I can prepare a hearty meal for everyone? My Chaqurl, in particular, is still a growing boy, and few things please me more than to see his belly full and round.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Grabende Pfoten müssen gut versorgt sein, damit nicht vom Fleisch fallen. Kannst du dabei helfen, ja?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three ant eggs. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Dann bring doch bitte drei <var 32 ((Item)) 06F27350030502 /var> aus Mjrls Sehnsucht, ja?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three silkworms. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>Dann bring doch bitte drei <var 32 ((Item)) 06F2736A030502 /var> aus Mjrls Sehnsucht, ja?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require a robber crab. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>Dann fang doch bitte <var 32 ((Item)) 06F27384020502 /var> im Lozatl, ja? Fängst du bestimmt leicht mit <var 32 ((Item)) 06F26BBE020502 /var> als Köder.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>Three ant eggs ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>Three silkworms ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>One robber crab ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms as bait, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>Bitte fang <var 32 ((Item)) 06F27384020502 /var> im Lozatl, ja? Fängst du bestimmt leicht mit <var 32 ((Item)) 06F26BBE020502 /var> als Köder.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>How fares the procuring effort, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>Qhoterl ist gespannt, was <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> Feines bringt!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall stew these eggs with spices and serve them with cornbread.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Wunderbar! Werden Eier kochen und zwischen zwei Hirsebrotscheiben legen.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>A delectable combination, as my Chaqurl will attest. He doesn't leave so much as a single crumb behind!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>Grabende Pfoten sind ganz verrückt danach. Qhoterl muss aufpassen, dass Qitari nicht so viel essen, bis grün im Gesicht werden.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Ah, splendid! Plump and fresh as they are, these silkworms are best prepared simply─fried and salted.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Wunderbar! So frische Larven muss man gar nicht mehr würzen. Einfach gegrillt mit Salz schmecken am besten!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_071<tab>If there's a way to my husband's stomach, I can say with confidence that this dish is it. The shine in his eyes doesn't lie!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_071<tab>Ist Lieblingsspeise von Qitarl Natl. Beim Essen haben Augen geleuchtet wie von kleines Kind beim Anblick von Süßigkeiten.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall boil this crab whole with vegetables and serve it with steamed grains!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Wunderbar! Krabbe wird mit Gemüse gekocht und dann als Eintopf zusammen mit gekochtem Getreide gegessen.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>I'm not too proud to admit that this is my personal favorite. Ah, the mere thought of it makes my mouth water... <slurp>
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>Qhoterl kann kaum erwarten. Qhoterl läuft schon Wasser im Maul zusammen!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>Without further ado, I shall set about preparing the meal. We are all in for a treat, and it is thanks to you, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>Dann kümmert Qhoterl sich mal gleich um Zubereitung. Vielen Dank für Lieferung!
